name: Cat Story With Leo's Fun Toys
name_original: Cat Story With Leo's Fun Toys
description:
Begin a brand new cat adventure and help Leo Catomy gather all the toys that are spread around in his house.
Match three or more objects (blocks) of the same kind to clear the level and help our little pet arrange his home and put his toys in the right place! Moves are limited so plan them carefully. 

While proceeding with the levels you will notice that it will not be an easy task to collect all Leo’s toys. You will find a lot of obstacles like: wild growing catnip, some big rocks, spider webs, ice cubes, and more stuff that will slow down your precious work.

Features:
• Eye-catching graphics and colorful game play 
• Exciting match 3 game
• Lovely toys to match like fish, birds, balls, etc. 
• Ice blocks, empty boxes, spider webs, growing plants that can block you. 
• Huge boosters, teleport combinations, electric blasts etc.
• Easy and fun to play, a real challenge to master 
• Loads of levels


After the whole work will be done Leo Catomy will be finally able to rest and get his bellowed food to reward himself.
